name: Pixel Kitchen (Rifky)
description:
Be the best cook in the world

Join JuKy on his typing adventure to get to the top. Six recipes to choose from. From indomie to the most luxurious hamburger ever.
Type your instruction to give to JuKy. He'll listen to whatever you say. Whether you want him to go to the cupboard, fridge, stove, etc.

Can you recreate the best recipes written by the best chefs in the world? Challange yourself now and type your way to victory!

Team:

Rifky Bujana Bisri as Programmer, 2D art

Keju as Programmer, 3D art, Music
